comment_body:
Put on some mumble rap and watch as the alien commit seppuku in their spaceship.

Mumble rap aside, nice story. Never read stories about alien that kills civilization just for musical purpose, and I really like it! Keep on writing.
When you said it sounded like people covered in sleigh bells, I thought the twist was they were murderous Christmas carolers
Yo, this is mad creepy and I like that.
